00008 InputManager::InputManager( void ) :
00009     mMouse( 0 ),
00010     mKeyboard( 0 ),
00011     mInputSystem( 0 ) {

00013 
00017 InputManager::~InputManager( void ) {
00018     if( mInputSystem ) {
00019         if( mMouse ) {
00020             mInputSystem->destroyInputObject( mMouse );
00021             mMouse = 0;
00022         }
00023 
00024         if( mKeyboard ) {
00025             mInputSystem->destroyInputObject( mKeyboard );
00026             mKeyboard = 0;
00027         }
00028 
00029         if( mJoysticks.size() > 0 ) {
00030             itJoystick    = mJoysticks.begin();
00031             itJoystickEnd = mJoysticks.end();
00032             for(; itJoystick != itJoystickEnd; ++itJoystick ) {
00033                 mInputSystem->destroyInputObject( *itJoystick );
00034             }
00035 
00036             mJoysticks.clear();
00037         }
00038 
00039         mInputSystem->destroyInputSystem(mInputSystem);
00040         mInputSystem = 0;
00041 
00042         // Clear Listeners
00043         mKeyListeners.clear();
00044         mMouseListeners.clear();
00045         mJoystickListeners.clear();
00046     }
00047 }

00054 void InputManager::initialise( Ogre::RenderWindow *renderWindow ) {
00055     if( !mInputSystem ) {
00056         // Setup basic variables
00057         OIS::ParamList paramList;    
00058         size_t windowHnd = 0;
00059         std::ostringstream windowHndStr;
00060 
00061         // Get window handle
00062 #if defined OIS_WIN32_PLATFORM
00063         renderWindow->getCustomAttribute( "HWND", &windowHnd );
00064         // Uncomment these two lines to allow users to switch keyboards via the language bar
00065         //paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_keyboard"), std::string("DISCL_FOREGROUND") ));
00066         //paramList.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("w32_keyboard"), std::string("DISCL_NONEXCLUSIVE") ));
00067 
00068 #elif defined OIS_LINUX_PLATFORM
00069         renderWindow->getCustomAttribute( "GLXWINDOW", &windowHnd );
00070 #endif
00071 
00072         // Fill parameter list
00073         windowHndStr << (unsigned int) windowHnd;
00074         paramList.insert( std::make_pair( std::string( "WINDOW" ), windowHndStr.str() ) );
00075 
00076         // Create inputsystem
00077         mInputSystem = OIS::InputManager::createInputSystem( paramList );
00078 
00079         // If possible create a buffered keyboard
00080         if( mInputSystem->numKeyBoards() > 0 ) {
00081             mKeyboard = static_cast<OIS::Keyboard*>( mInputSystem->createInputObject( OIS::OISKeyboard, true ) );
00082             mKeyboard->setEventCallback( this );
00083         }
00084 
00085         // If possible create a buffered mouse
00086         if( mInputSystem->numMice() > 0 ) {
00087             mMouse = static_cast<OIS::Mouse*>( mInputSystem->createInputObject( OIS::OISMouse, true ) );
00088             mMouse->setEventCallback( this );
00089 
00090             // Get window size
00091             unsigned int width, height, depth;
00092             int left, top;
00093             renderWindow->getMetrics( width, height, depth, left, top );
00094 
00095             // Set mouse region
00096             this->setWindowExtents( width, height );
00097         }
00098 
00099         // If possible create all joysticks in buffered mode
00100         if( mInputSystem->numJoysticks() > 0 ) {
00101             mJoysticks.resize( mInputSystem->numJoysticks() );
00102 
00103             itJoystick    = mJoysticks.begin();
00104             itJoystickEnd = mJoysticks.end();
00105             for(; itJoystick != itJoystickEnd; ++itJoystick ) {
00106                 (*itJoystick) = static_cast<OIS::JoyStick*>( mInputSystem->createInputObject( OIS::OISJoyStick, true ) );
00107                 (*itJoystick)->setEventCallback( this );
00108             }
00109         }
00110     }
00111 }

00118 void InputManager::capture( void ) {
00119     // Need to capture / update each device every frame
00120     if( mMouse ) {
00121         mMouse->capture();
00122     }
00123 
00124     if( mKeyboard ) {
00125         mKeyboard->capture();
00126     }
00127 
00128     if( mJoysticks.size() > 0 ) {
00129         itJoystick    = mJoysticks.begin();
00130         itJoystickEnd = mJoysticks.end();
00131         for(; itJoystick != itJoystickEnd; ++itJoystick ) {
00132             (*itJoystick)->capture();
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }

00143 void InputManager::addKeyListener( OIS::KeyListener *keyListener, const std::string& instanceName ) {
00144     if( mKeyboard ) {
00145         // Check for duplicate items
00146         itKeyListener = mKeyListeners.find( instanceName );
00147         if( itKeyListener == mKeyListeners.end() ) {
00148             mKeyListeners[ instanceName ] = keyListener;
00149         }
00150         else {
00151             // Duplicate Item
00152         }
00153     }
00154 }

00199 void InputManager::removeKeyListener( const std::string& instanceName ) {
00200     // Check if item exists
00201     itKeyListener = mKeyListeners.find( instanceName );
00202     if( itKeyListener != mKeyListeners.end() ) {
00203         mKeyListeners.erase( itKeyListener );
00204     }
00205     else {
00206         // Doesn't Exist
00207     }
00208 }

00247 void InputManager::removeKeyListener( OIS::KeyListener *keyListener ) {
00248     itKeyListener    = mKeyListeners.begin();
00249     itKeyListenerEnd = mKeyListeners.end();
00250     for(; itKeyListener != itKeyListenerEnd; ++itKeyListener ) {
00251         if( itKeyListener->second == keyListener ) {
00252             mKeyListeners.erase( itKeyListener );
00253             break;
00254         }
00255     }
00256 }

00326 void InputManager::setWindowExtents( int width, int height ) {
00327   // Set mouse region (if window resizes, we should alter this to 
00328   // reflect as well)
00329   const OIS::MouseState &mouseState = mMouse->getMouseState();
00330   mouseState.width  = width;
00331   mouseState.height = height;
00332 }

00359 OIS::JoyStick* InputManager::getJoystick( unsigned int index ) {
00360     // Make sure it's a valid index
00361     if( index < mJoysticks.size() ) {
00362         return mJoysticks[ index ];
00363     }
00364 
00365     return 0;
00366 }

00385 bool InputManager::keyPressed( const OIS::KeyEvent &e ) {
00386     itKeyListener    = mKeyListeners.begin();
00387     itKeyListenerEnd = mKeyListeners.end();
00388     for(; itKeyListener != itKeyListenerEnd; ++itKeyListener ) {
00389         itKeyListener->second->keyPressed( e );
00390     }
00391 
00392     return true;
00393 }
